original_text: You shall speak to him and put the words in his mouth, and I will be with your mouth and with his mouth and will teach you both what to do.
korean_text: 너는 그에게 말하고 그의 입에 할 말을 주라 내가 네 입과 그의 입에 함께 있어서 너희들이 행할 일을 가르치리라

sentences.original_text: and put the words in his mouth
and I will be with your mouth and with his mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네 입과 그의 입에 함께하리라

sentences.original_text: and will teach you both what to do
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 둘에게 무엇을 해야 할지 가르쳐 주리라
